name: Inno Setup SBOM
comment: Scope: dependencies for Inno Setup projects (some components are optional).

packages.comment: Optional feature; used by ISCmplr only.

packages.name: RemObjects Pascal Script
packages.copyrightText: Copyright (C) 2000-2014 by Carlo Kok and RemObjects Software, LLC
packages.comment: Optional feature; tracked as a git submodule and required revision is recorded in the Inno Setup repo.
packages.sourceInfo: Submodule path Components/UniPs; revision is recorded via .gitmodules and the repo's submodule metadata.

packages.name: LZMA SDK (Size-optimized)
packages.comment: Optimized-for-size decoder (LzmaDecodeSize.c, LzmaDecode.h) plus LzmaTypes.h which is public domain.

packages.name: zlib
packages.copyrightText: Copyright (C) 1995-2024 Jean-loup Gailly and Mark Adler
packages.supplier: Person: Jean-loup Gailly and Mark Adler
packages.comment: Optional compression and decompression; used by Setup via iszlib/isunzlib precompiled libraries. License text in Iscompress/zlib/LICENSE.

packages.name: bzip2 (bzlib)
packages.comment: Optional compression and decompression; used by Setup via isbzip/isbunzip precompiled libraries. License text in Iscompress/bzlib/LICENSE.

packages.name: 7-Zip
packages.licenseConcluded: LGPL-2.1-or-later AND LicenseRef-unRAR-restriction AND BSD-3-Clause AND BSD-2-Clause AND LicenseRef-7zip-Public-Domain
packages.licenseDeclared: LGPL-2.1-or-later AND LicenseRef-unRAR-restriction AND BSD-3-Clause AND BSD-2-Clause AND LicenseRef-7zip-Public-Domain
packages.comment: Optional decompression; is7z/is7zxa/is7zxr DLLs are compiled from 7-Zip source code (see README.md). License details in Is7z/DOC/License.txt describe LGPL-2.1-or-later with unRAR restriction, plus BSD-3-Clause/BSD-2-Clause and public domain files.

packages.name: Scintilla
packages.comment: Used by ISIDE via isscint DLL. License text in Isscint/License.txt.

The decompression engine for RAR archives was developed using source
code of unRAR program.
All copyrights to original unRAR code are owned by Alexander Roshal.

The license for original unRAR code has the following restriction:

Some files are public domain files, if public domain status is stated in the source file.
